item.title: Aggressive Training
item.fluff: Your tactics are legendary for their devastating nature

block.name: Property
block.line: You gain a +1 item bonus to Intimidate checks.
Level 14: +3 item bonus.
Level 24: +5 item bonus.

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: Trigger: An enemy hits you with a melee attack
Effect: You make a melee basic attack against the triggering enemy.

item.title: Battle-Scarred Champion
item.fluff: Each scar marring your body recalls a past glory and the opponents who fell to your attacks

block.name: Property
block.line: You gain a +1 item bonus to your healing surge value.
Level 13: +2 item bonus.
Level 23: +3 item bonus.

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: Trigger: An enemy bloodies you, but does not reduce you to 0 hit points or fewer
Effect: You make a melee basic attack against the triggering enemy.

item.title: Beloved Performer
item.fluff: You are known for your daring escapades and your mocking wit

block.name: Property
block.line: You gain a +1 item bonus to Acrobatics checks and Bluff checks.
Level 11: +3 item bonus.
Level 21: +5 item bonus.

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: Trigger: An enemy marks you
Effect: The triggering mark ends, and you shift 1 square.
Level 11: This power can be used as an opportunity reaction instead.
Level 21: This power is an encounter power instead.

item.title: Closed Mind
item.fluff: By erecting mental bulwarks, you ward yourself against hostile psychic attacks

block.name: Property
block.line: You gain resist 5 psychic.
Level 13: Resist 10.
Level 23: Resist 15.

item.title: Cunning Victor
item.fluff: You are a crafty warrior, and know how to exploit the whims of fate

block.name: Property
block.line: You gain a +1 item bonus to Bluff checks.
Level 13: +3 item bonus.
Level 23: +5 item bonus.

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: Trigger: You roll a 1 on an attack roll, ability check, skill check, or saving throw
Effect: You reroll the triggering roll or check until the result is something other than a 1.

item.title: Five Starts Arrow Deflection
item.fluff: Do not be fast; Do not be quick; Become the arrow before it strikes your flesh

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: Effect: You move up to your speed.
While you keep one hand free, you gain a +2 power bonus to all defenses against ranged Weapon attacks until the end of your next turn.
Level 13: +4 power bonus.
While you have this bonus, you can use the following action:
Immediate Interrupt: Trigger: An enemy misses you with a ranged Weapon attack; The triggering enemy rerolls the triggering attack against a creature of your choice within 5 squares of you.
Level 23: You can use this action as an opportunity interrupt instead.

item.title: Focused Static
item.fluff: You learn to project your thoughts to scramble your enemies' minds

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: Trigger: You score a critical hit against an enemy with a psionic power
Effect: The triggering enemy takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls until the end of your next turn.
Level 12: A -2 penalty to attack rolls (save ends) or until the end of your next turn, whichever is longer.
Level 22: The triggering enemy's thoughts a scrambled (save ends). While its thoughts are scrambled, the enemy is dazed and takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls.

item.title: Iron Hand Anvil Breaker
item.fluff: Move slowly to center your body, find the weakness in your target that will cause it to crumble, and then strike

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: Effect: You move up to half your speed.
The first melee attack you make this turn deals 1d6 extra damage, or 2d6 extra damage against an unattended, inanimate object.
Level 12: 3d6 against an inanimate object.
Level 22: 2d6 extra damage, or 4d6 extra damage against an inanimate object.

item.title: Legacy Undying
item.fluff: So long as the Flame Imperishable exists, the soul of Nerath is kindled, and your faith in that inspires you and your allies to greatness

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: Effect: Close burst 5 (you and each ally in the burst); Each target gains temporary hit points equal to the number of healing surges you have remaining.
Level 12: Twice the number of healing surges you have remaining.
Level 22: Three times the number of healing surges you have remaining.

item.title: Third Eye of Second Sight
item.fluff: You have a third eye that grants you the gift of second sight, whether you learned to open it yourself or were granted the ability by a patron

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: Special: This power has either the Arcane, Divine, Primal, Psionic, or Shadow keyword, depending on how you gained the boon.
Trigger: An attack hits you, but does not critical hit you
Level 18: Hits you or an ally within 5 squares of you
Level 28: The attack can be a critical hit
Effect: The triggering attack misses instead.

item.title: Unconquerable
item.fluff: You have a fearsome reputation as someone who can't be kept down, and you embrace it to your advantage

block.name: Property
block.line: You gain a +1 item bonus to Intimidate checks.
Level 13: +3 item bonus.
Level 23: +5 item bonus.

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: Trigger: An enemy knocks you prone
Effect: You spend a healing surge to regain hit points equal to your healing surge value, and can then stand from prone.
